issue.title: Cannot convert DataFrame with `numpy.dtype` cells to `pyarrow.Table`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14087](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14087). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<font color="#172b4d">Example:</font>
```java

df = pd.DataFrame([np.dtype("<i2")]
```
raises an <font color="#de350b">ArrowInvalid</font> exception with <font color="#de350b">Could not convert dtype...</font>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14087?focusedCommentId=17483228) by Michael Rose (MERose):*
Based on the number of views of the corresponding question on StackOverflow (<https://stackoverflow.com/questions/69578431/how-to-fix-streamlitapiexception-expected-bytes-got-a-int-object-conver),> I'd like to ask to reconsider the priority. Currently it's minor. But 5k views since September 2021 state otherwise.
